text: Then the Spirit came upon12:18. “Came upon”: literally, “clothed.” Amasai, the leader of the Thirty. “We are yours, David, and we are with you, son of Jesse! May peace, prosperity, and success12:18. “Peace, prosperity, and success”: literally, “Shalom, shalom to you, and shalom whoever helps you.” be yours and those who help you, for God is the one who is helping you.” So David allowed them to join him, and put them in charge of his bands of raiders.
